channel.title: Fxhome on Kev's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Fxhome on Kev's Site

item.title: Exporting footage with dvgrab to edit with fxhome HitFilm Express
item.description: While tidying the loft I came across my old JVC Mini DV Camcorder that I purchased in about 2001. I was looking to recycle an old, unused PC that was also in the loft when it occurred to me that the old PC had a firewire card installed. A quick check confirmed that the firewire card would not fit into my regular PC, so hanging on to this old PC for a while longer was my best chance of getting the footage off the old mini dv tapes.
